OOC: I'm going to have to disagree... partly... but to the same ends.  The 
base part... alright yeah... that was moding... ignoring other people, bad 
form though not technically moding.  As for the shots against Perceptor... He 
is Airly's character thus it is her place to complain about them.  Should she 
desire to raise a complaint, that is her right.  It is no one else's place to 
complain about it.  Trust me, if something is bothering Airly she'll let 
someone know.

       That said, it is all rather moot because they shouldn't have been 
inside the base to begin with.  In all honesty I don't have time right now to 
figure out where they should be.  I'm going to leave that up to the 
participants and/or the other members of the council to work out.  I need to 
go study for an AP test first thing tomorrow morning.  Good Night.

--part1_178.1a4afdea.2beb1d9a_boundary
